nodes.text: The Jalindi Station, also known as the Jalindi relay or the Jalindi outpost, was an Imperial communications outpost located on the planet Jalindi.

Sporting a massive relay dish developed by the Galactic Empire, Jalindi Station was a communications outpost situated atop one of the mountain spikes of the planet Jalindi. The outpost amplified communications, allowing for the Empire to expand their detection screen in surrounding sectors, conducting large scale information dissemination and the monitoring of transmissions, impeding rebel movements.

Around 1 BBY, the Spectres were deployed to install a spike on the station, so that the rebellion could tap into the Imperial network, and spy on Imperial fleet movements. The rebels were spotted when an Arquitens-class command cruiser, the Marauder arrived, and were forced to scuttle the mission by destroying the Imperial relay dish instead, which Saw Gerrera accomplished when he arrived.
